thread.title: Watch: Hundreds brave icy waters for New Year’s Day dip
thread.title_full: Watch: Hundreds brave icy waters for New Year’s Day dip

author: Lucy Leeson
title: Watch: Hundreds brave icy waters for New Year’s Day dip
text:
[Independent TV](/tv)
Showing now | Lifestyle
00:37
Watch: Hundreds brave icy waters for New Year’s Day dip
While many
[people](/topic/people) across the [UK](/topic/uk) started 2024 nursing a hangover, or catching up on some well-needed [sleep](/topic/sleep) after a heavy night, these braved souls tackled icy waters and freezing [temperatures](/topic/temperatures) for a New Year’s Day dip.
These were the scenes at the Gosport New Year’s Day Dip at The Solent at Stokes Bay in
[Hampshire](/topic/hampshire) on Monday 1 January.
Hundreds took part in the event to raise vital funds for the Gosport and Fareham Inshore Rescue Service.
Congratulations to all who took part.
